text: Fragment of an Empire () is a 1929 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Fridrikh Ermler.Как Госфильмофонд собирает коллекцию и реставрирует кино It stars Fyodor Nikitin, Yakov Gudkin, and Lyudmila Semyonova. ==Actors== *Fyodor Nikitin as Filimonov *Yakov Gudkin as The wounded soldier *Lyudmila Semyonova as Filimonov's wife *Valeri Solovtsov as Filimonov's wife's new husband *Emil Gal as Passenger in the train == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian silent movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1929 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Fridrikh Ermler Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Fragment of an Empire
